item.title: Color Theme Switcher
item.description: Your site has a dark mode? That’s cute. Mine has ten different themes now, and they’re all named after Mario Kart race tracks. Last year, the design gods decided that dark modes were the new hotness. “Light colors are for suckers”, they laughed, drinking matcha tea on their fixie bikes or whatever. And so every operating system, app and even some websites (mine included) suddenly had to come up with a dark mode.
